text: Edwin Charles "Teddy" Daw (23 January 1875 – 1944) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1875 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Footballers from Doncaster Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Rushden Town F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Gillingham F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Merthyr Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Teddy Daw
